# sourceRegion

**Instance Property**

The region in the source texture, in tiles.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceRegion: MTLRegion
```

## Discussion

The tiles remain mapped in the source texture.

When [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CopySparseTextureMappingOperation/sourceLevel] is equal to the source texture’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture/firstMipmapInTail], set `origin.y` to `0` and `size.height` to `1`.
